title: Serious FPS Problem
body: To make a short story short yesterday I had 100-160 fps and during the night I updated my pc and today i have 30-50 fps. Please help and Thank you.

replies.body: Your drivers may need to be updated as well with your OS update.  Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for that, in addition to steps to help rule out possibilities.  Test it in a custom and let me know how it goes.
